details: Art, architecture, literature flourished during this time.
books: Notable books include works by Machiavelli and Rabelais.
film: No film existed in this era, but theatrical performances were rich.

details: Philosophy and scientific thought developed rapidly.
books: Key Enlightenment texts include works by Voltaire and Rousseau.
film: Theatre was still dominant; early experiments in shadow plays.
theatre: Theatre became more political and socially engaged.
